episodeTitle: Alubarna is Crying! Fierce Fight of Captain Karoo!
episodeTitleJapanese: 嘆きのアルバーナ！激闘カルー隊長！
episodeTitleRomanized: Nageki no Arubāna! Gekitō Karū taichō!
description: Vivi desperately tries to stop the rebel army but is pursued by Mr. 2 Bon Clay. Karoo bravely protects her despite his injuries. Meanwhile, Usopp and Chopper begin their battle against the Baroque Works officer agents Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, facing their deadly Devil Fruit abilities.

events.title: Vivi Reaches Alubarna Outskirts
events.description: Princess Vivi arrives at the outskirts of Alubarna, desperately trying to reach the rebel army to stop the civil war before it fully engulfs the capital city.
events.significance: Marks the critical moment where Vivi attempts to prevent the full-scale battle, showing her determination to save her kingdom.

quotes.text: I have to stop them! I won't let this country be destroyed!
quotes.speaker: Vivi
quotes.context: Vivi's determination to stop the civil war

events.title: Mr. 2 Disguises as Usopp to Trick Vivi
events.description: Mr. 2 Bon Clay uses his Mane Mane no Mi powers to transform into Usopp, attempting to deceive Vivi. However, Karoo recognizes the deception and carries Vivi away to safety.
events.significance: Demonstrates Karoo's intelligence and loyalty, as well as showcasing Mr. 2's deceptive tactics using his Clone-Clone Fruit powers.

quotes.text: Vivi-chan! It's me, Usopp! Let me help you!
quotes.speaker: Mr. 2 (disguised as Usopp)

events.title: Mr. 2 Pursues Vivi and Karoo
events.description: After his disguise is revealed, Mr. 2 Bon Clay begins pursuing Princess Vivi and the injured Karoo across Alubarna, attempting to eliminate her before she can stop the war.
events.significance: Escalates the tension as Vivi becomes a direct target of assassination, with only the wounded Karoo to protect her.

events.title: Karoo's Heroic Determination
events.description: Despite being severely injured from a stray bullet, Karoo remembers Luffy's words about Vivi being their friend and pushes himself beyond his limits to protect her, even using his wings to climb buildings.
events.significance: Showcases Karoo's character development from a comedic sidekick to a brave protector, demonstrating the series' theme of friendship and loyalty inspiring courage.

quotes.text: Vivi is the Straw Hats' friend!
quotes.speaker: Karoo (thinking)
quotes.context: Karoo remembering Luffy's words while pushing himself to protect Vivi

events.title: Usopp Finds Wounded Chopper
events.description: Usopp discovers an injured Chopper at the battlefield, having been hurt by Baroque Works agents. They prepare to face their enemies together.
events.significance: Brings together two of the Straw Hats' weaker fighters who must overcome their fears to battle powerful Devil Fruit users.

events.title: Debut of Lassoo - The Gun-Dog
events.description: Mr. 4's weapon, Lassoo, is revealed to be a gun that has eaten the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund, transforming it into a living dachshund-gun hybrid capable of firing explosive baseballs.
events.significance: Introduces the first inanimate object shown in the series to have consumed a Devil Fruit, expanding the possibilities of Devil Fruit usage in the One Piece world.

quotes.text: That gun... it's alive! It ate a Devil Fruit!
quotes.speaker: Chopper

events.title: Miss Merry Christmas's Mogu Mogu no Mi Revealed
events.description: Miss Merry Christmas demonstrates her Mogu Mogu no Mi (Mole-Mole Fruit) powers, transforming into a mole and creating an extensive network of underground tunnels that give her and Mr. 4 complete battlefield control.
events.significance: Reveals the Devil Fruit ability that makes this battle particularly challenging, as the enemies can attack from underground while remaining hidden.

quotes.text: Miss Merry Christmas ate the Mole Mole Fruit, so she can go underground!
quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Chopper explaining the enemy's ability to Usopp

events.title: Usopp and Chopper vs Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas Begins
events.description: The battle officially begins as Usopp and Chopper face off against Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas. The Baroque Works duo unleashes their coordinated attacks using Lassoo's explosive baseballs and Miss Merry Christmas's underground mobility.
events.significance: Marks the beginning of one of the most memorable battles in the Arabasta Arc, testing the courage and ingenuity of the Straw Hats' two most fearful members.

events.title: Mr. 4's Baseball Bat Attack Technique
events.description: Mr. 4 demonstrates his fighting style, using his enormous strength to hit Lassoo's explosive baseballs with a 4-ton baseball bat, turning them into deadly time-bomb projectiles.
events.significance: Showcases the coordinated attack strategy between Mr. 4 and Lassoo that makes them such formidable opponents.

events.title: Sanji Fights Through Both Armies
events.description: Sanji finds himself caught between the Royal Army and Rebel Army. Declaring he fights only for ladies, he battles through both sides to reach and protect Vivi from Mr. 2.
events.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's chivalrous nature and combat prowess as he refuses to take sides in the war, focusing solely on protecting Vivi.

quotes.text: I'm not with either of you! I only fight for the ladies!
quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Sanji declaring his neutrality while fighting through both armies

events.title: Karoo Gets Shot by Stray Bullet
events.description: While protecting Vivi from Mr. 2, Karoo is hit by a stray bullet from the chaotic battle between the Royal and Rebel armies, severely injuring him but not stopping his determination to save Vivi.
events.significance: Heightens the danger and chaos of the civil war, showing how innocent parties are caught in the crossfire, while emphasizing Karoo's heroism.

events.title: Duck Squad Members Arrive to Help
events.description: Two members of the Duck Squad arrive with Sanji, taking the heavily wounded Karoo to safety while Sanji prepares to face Mr. 2 Bon Clay in battle.
events.significance: Provides relief as Karoo is rescued from immediate danger, allowing Sanji to focus on confronting Mr. 2.

quotes.text: I have to stop them! I won't let this country be destroyed!
quotes.speaker: Vivi
quotes.context: Vivi's determination to prevent the civil war

quotes.text: Vivi is the Straw Hats' friend!
quotes.speaker: Karoo
quotes.context: Karoo remembering Luffy's words while protecting Vivi

quotes.text: Miss Merry Christmas ate the Mole Mole Fruit, so she can go underground!
quotes.speaker: Chopper
quotes.context: Explaining the enemy's Devil Fruit ability

quotes.text: I'm not with either of you! I only fight for the ladies!
quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Fighting through both armies to reach Vivi

themes.description: Karoo's heroic efforts to protect Vivi despite his injuries exemplify the power of friendship and loyalty, directly inspired by Luffy's declaration that Vivi is their friend.
themes.symbolism: Karoo's determination mirrors the Straw Hats' unwavering commitment to their friends, even in the face of overwhelming danger.

themes.theme: Courage in the Face of Fear
themes.description: Usopp and Chopper, the crew's most cowardly members, must face powerful Devil Fruit users. Their battle represents overcoming fear through necessity and friendship.
themes.symbolism: The two weakest Straw Hats facing seemingly impossible odds symbolizes the series' message that courage isn't the absence of fear, but acting despite it.

themes.description: Karoo being shot by a stray bullet highlights how civil war affects everyone, not just the combatants, emphasizing the tragedy of the conflict.
themes.symbolism: The chaotic battlefield where friend and foe alike can be harmed by random violence underscores the senselessness of the civil war.

characterSpotlights.development: Karoo transforms from a comedic animal sidekick into a genuine hero, risking his life to protect Vivi. His actions are motivated by remembering Luffy's declaration of friendship.
keyActions: Carries Vivi away from danger despite injuries
Gets shot protecting Vivi but continues running
Uses wings to climb buildings to escape Mr. 2
Is rescued by Duck Squad members and Sanji
quotes: Vivi is the Straw Hats' friend!

characterSpotlights.development: Vivi's desperation to stop the war intensifies as she becomes a target of assassination while trying to reach the rebel army.
keyActions: Attempts to reach the rebel army to stop the war
Nearly falls for Mr. 2's Usopp disguise
Relies on Karoo for protection while fleeing Mr. 2
quotes: I have to stop them! I won't let this country be destroyed!

characterSpotlights.development: Usopp must overcome his natural cowardice to protect Chopper and fight against overwhelming odds, setting up his character growth in the coming episodes.
keyActions: Faces Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas
Begins to strategize against Devil Fruit users

characterSpotlights.development: Despite being wounded, Chopper analyzes the enemy's abilities and prepares to fight alongside Usopp.
keyActions: Explains Miss Merry Christmas's Mogu Mogu no Mi
Identifies Lassoo as a gun that ate a Devil Fruit
quotes: Miss Merry Christmas ate the Mole Mole Fruit, so she can go underground!

characterSpotlights.development: Sanji's unwavering devotion to protecting women drives him to fight through both armies to reach Vivi.
keyActions: Realizes Vivi is in danger from Mr. 2
Fights through both Royal and Rebel armies
Arrives with Duck Squad members to rescue Karoo
quotes: I'm not with either of you! I only fight for the ladies!

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extends the sequences of Karoo protecting Vivi and adds more dramatic tension to his injuries.
Sanji's fight through both armies is given more screen time in the anime with additional combat choreography.

trivia.fact: This episode marks the debut of Lassoo, the first inanimate object shown to have eaten a Devil Fruit in the One Piece series.
The Mogu Mogu no Mi is one of the earliest Zoan-type Devil Fruits shown that allows transformation into a non-predatory animal.

sources.title: Mogu Mogu no Mi - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: This episode was animated by Kazuya Hisada, who was known for his work on several key Arabasta Arc episodes.
The episode title references Karoo as 'Captain', highlighting his leadership role in the Duck Squad and his heroic actions in this episode.
